```pddl
[
  (:action cut ; Cut an item and update its state
    :parameters (?actor - person ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?item) (shape ?item uncut))
    :effect (and (shape ?item cut) (length ?item shorter))
  ),
  
  (:action slip ; Slip a bead onto an elastic strip and organize it
    :parameters (?p - person ?bead - bead ?elastic_strip - elastic)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?bead) (at ?p ?elastic_strip) (location ?bead off_strip))
    :effect (and (location ?bead on_strip) (organization ?bead in_order))
  ),
  
  (:action finish ; Finish working with an item
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?item) (or (location ?item off_strip) (status ?item completed)))
    :effect (and (or (location ?item on_strip) (organization ?item in_order) (status ?item completed) (wreath ?item completed)))
  )
]
```
